title: Collaborative Learning Program for Information System Analysis and Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and Logical Problem-Solving Competency
context.additional_context: Emphasis on asynchronous collaborative activities optimized for smartphone-based online learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze real-life scenario-based information system requirements.
Learners can create logical flowcharts to solve system design problems through collaboration.
Learners can complete basic design documents, including ERDs, while communicating with team members in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
